songs.title: Talm Bout
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
You know, I fuck with Kodak right
But y'all ass, y'all gotta chill
Boy y'all takin' that shit to a whole 'nother level
Tellin' you boy, ayy
Aight look

[Chorus]
Talkin' 'bout the next Kodak, uh uh
I wanna be GlokkNine
Talkin' 'bout this a dumb sack dressed in black
Oh we gon' blitz right now, yeah
And yes I love buck the jack, take sack
So I'm 'bout to skate right now
Holdin' on to what, bitch it's thirty in the cut, mmh
He got a Glock four-five, yeah
Talkin' 'bout the next Kodak, uh uh
I wanna be GlokkNine
Talkin' 'bout this a dumb sack dressed in black
Oh we gon' blitz right now
And yes I love buck the jack, take sack
So I'm 'bout to skate right now
Holdin' on to what, bitch it's thirty in the cut, mmh
And he got a Glock four-five, yeah

[Verse]
Nigga talkin' like he know me
I don't know shit the nigga 'bout
I was in the store four deep
Four pints, and all a nigga seen one five
Creepin' through the back lowkey
It's a beam on the Glock just for them point em out, so
Our niggas playin' hide and seek
Me and Leek on the street, tryna see what it's about
How the fuck I'm tryna be the next nigga when the next nigga already caught a ride?
Found my own map, took a new route
I ain't eatin' much, really I forgot
Nina with a dick on it, that's a dick on it
For a pussy, tired of come about, ayy
But this ain't a diss nigga, free Kodak
Pussy ass crackers need to let him wild, ayy

[Chorus]
Talkin' 'bout the next Kodak, uh uh
I wanna be GlokkNine
Talkin' 'bout this a dumb sack dressed in black
Oh we gon' blitz right now, yeah
And yes I love buck the jack, take sack
So I'm 'bout to skate right now
Holdin' on to what, bitch it's thirty in the cut, mmh
He got a Glock four-five, yeah
Talkin' 'bout the next Kodak, uh uh
I wanna be GlokkNine
Talkin' 'bout this a dumb sack dressed in black
Oh we gon' blitz right now
And yes I love buck the jack, take sack
So I'm 'bout to skate right now
Holdin' on to what, bitch it's thirty in the cut, mmh
And he got a Glock four-five, yeah

[Interlude: Shawn Cotton & GlokkNine]
I woke up and they were all comparing you to Kodak Black
Well yeah
Everybody was comparing you to Kodak Black. Does that get to you?
Nah I fuck with Yak. That boy be spittin' that real shit. So them comparing me to him is like shit... that means I'm doin' somethin' right

[Chorus]
Talkin' 'bout the next Kodak, uh uh
I wanna be GlokkNine
Talkin' 'bout this a dumb sack dressed in black
Oh we gon' blitz right now, yeah
And yes I love buck the jack, take sack
So I'm 'bout to skate right now
Holdin' on to what, bitch it's thirty in the cut, mmh
He got a Glock four-five, yeah
Talkin' 'bout the next Kodak, uh uh
I wanna be GlokkNine
Talkin' 'bout this a dumb sack dressed in black
Oh we gon' blitz right now
And yes I love buck the jack, take sack
So I'm 'bout to skate right now
Holdin' on to what, bitch it's thirty in the cut, mmh
And he got a Glock four-five, yeah
